answers.author: HL Lowry
answers.text:
Just fyi that includes all maintenance costs, fuel, insurance, hanger fees and salary for the pilot. The raw cost for the aircraft is less than $120.00 per hour.  If you compare that to say a helicopter at $700-$1200 per hour, that is pretty cheap. 
However I appreciate the comment and would love to start a dialog.

author: HL Lowry
text:
If you had a group approach your city and offer an airplane for public safety use with no capital costs, would you be interested?  
We have a low cost plane with pilot that with all costs included will fly over 1000 hours per year for about $200,000.00. Yet helicopter programs run into the millions of dollars per year.  
I would be interested to talk with any city leaders about this concept or if you have any feedback or comments.
Thanks for your input in advance.
HL
